title: Lemon Butter Baked Shrimp
directions: Pour the mixture of the melted butter and minced garlic in a 9×11 inch glass casserole dish. Place the lemon slices over the butter then top with a layer of the shrimp. Season with the italian seasoning and sprinkle the parsley flakes and pepper on top. In a preheated oven to 350°, bake for 15 minutes.
ingredients: 1 lb of cleaned, peeled and deveined raw shrimp.
1 packet of good seasons Italian all natural seasoning or Old Bay
